title: 18 Statement Earrings to Freshen Up Your Jewelry Box
description: Let your jewelry do the talking.
excerpt: From high fashion finds to elevated one-of-a-kind pieces, I found the best statement earrings that are guaranteed to turn heads.
text: Liquid GoldAlexis Bittar Crumpled Large Post Earrings Claire Stern Milch, digital director, points to this Alexis Bittar pair as her go-to statement earring.Sophie Buhai Angelika Silver Jasper EarringsSilver and gold—who needs ’em? Not Madison Rexroat, fashion and accessories assistant, who considers these a favorite. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowMade By Hand Annele Raspberry Jelly Earrings Associate fashion commerce editor Meg Donohue says she never really played around with earrings until she tried these. They’re more chic and versatile than you might assume, and it doesn’t hurt that celebrities love them, too. Glimmer & Gleam Isabel Marant Silvertone, Resin & Glass Crystal Hoop EarringsAs for fashion and market accessories director Alexis Wolfe, she can’t stop thinking about this crystalline pair from Isabel Marant.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowPop of ColorCompletedworks Ruffle Bio-Resin EarringsSenior fashion commerce editor Dale Arden Chong might be ELLE.com’s foremost jewelry expert. So, I trust this pick from her, and you should, too. Cut Out The YSSO Homer Gold-Plated EarringsLike a halo, but for your ears. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowMixed Metals Justine Clenquet Iris EarringsThis eclectic and mismatched duo gives new meaning to the phrase “mixed metals.” The recommendation comes from Madison Rexroat. Pink & DiamondsBea Bongiasca 9K Gold, Diamond, and Pink Enamel Polka Dot EarringsMake a funky statement with these splatter-shaped hoops from Bea Bongiasca. Elevated Staple Bottega Veneta Small Drop EarringsThese aren’t new; everyone has been obsessed with them for a minute. But Meg Donohue says every time she sees someone wearing them, she’s reminded of how investment-worthy they truly are. Playful HuggiesCoach Cherry And Heart Multi Charm Huggie EarringsThe charm trend is taking over, both in jewelry and bags. While these aren’t technically charm earrings, they have the same effect.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowUnder $200 Jenny Bird Nouveaux Puff EarringsSometimes you want a statement that can still be worn everyday; these are just that, according to commerce lead Alexis Bennett Parker. Jewel Tones Roxanne Assoulin The Marvelous Drop EarringsIf you want to feel like a pretty princess, these Roxanne Assoulin earrings add color and glitz to any outfit. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowPearl Clusters Sophie Billie Brahe Grand Bisou Pearl Earrings You, too, can be the girl in the pearl earrings with this elegant pick from Madison Rexroat. Amazon GemSordo Oriente EarringsAlexis Bennett Parker’s choice is these sculptural silver drop earrings, which you can buy from Amazon. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowLittle Miss Matched Ulla Johnson Zayin Earring BrassOne of the coolest jewelry trends this year has definitely been asymmetry, which is exactly what this pair from Ulla Johnson offers. Hoops on Hoops Panconesi Silver Pierced Serpent Hoop EarringsMadison Rexroat told the team about Panconesi, and now Meg Donohue is utterly obsessed with these hopped up hoops. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBig HeartedLele Sadoughi Pearl Heart Stud Earrings Lele Sadoughi has no shortage of statement earrings to choose from. I like these oversized pearl hearts because they’re both casual and classy.Ear Cuff Charlotte Chesnais Daisy Ear Cuff Ear cuffs are already a statement, but this large cage style is especially so. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowFlower Chains Anthropologie Flower Drop EarringsThese playful floral danglers will add whimsy to any outfit. Plus, the cheerful style is super lightweight, making them easy to wear. Why Trust ELLEEvery product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. html:
Liquid Gold

Alexis Bittar Crumpled Large Post Earrings

Claire Stern Milch, digital director, points to this Alexis Bittar pair as her go-to statement earring.

Sophie Buhai Angelika Silver Jasper Earrings

Silver and gold—who needs ’em? Not Madison Rexroat, fashion and accessories assistant, who considers these a favorite.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Made By Hand

Annele Raspberry Jelly Earrings

Associate fashion commerce editor Meg Donohue says she never really played around with earrings until she tried these. They’re more chic and versatile than you might assume, and it doesn’t hurt that celebrities love them, too.

Glimmer & Gleam

Isabel Marant Silvertone, Resin & Glass Crystal Hoop Earrings

As for fashion and market accessories director Alexis Wolfe, she can’t stop thinking about this crystalline pair from Isabel Marant.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Pop of Color

Completedworks Ruffle Bio-Resin Earrings

Senior fashion commerce editor Dale Arden Chong might be ELLE.com’s foremost jewelry expert. So, I trust this pick from her, and you should, too.

Cut Out

The YSSO Homer Gold-Plated Earrings

Like a halo, but for your ears.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Mixed Metals

Justine Clenquet Iris Earrings

This eclectic and mismatched duo gives new meaning to the phrase “mixed metals.” The recommendation comes from Madison Rexroat.

Pink & Diamonds

Bea Bongiasca 9K Gold, Diamond, and Pink Enamel Polka Dot Earrings

Make a funky statement with these splatter-shaped hoops from Bea Bongiasca.

Elevated Staple

Bottega Veneta Small Drop Earrings

These aren’t new; everyone has been obsessed with them for a minute. But Meg Donohue says every time she sees someone wearing them, she’s reminded of how investment-worthy they truly are.

Playful Huggies

Coach Cherry And Heart Multi Charm Huggie Earrings

The charm trend is taking over, both in jewelry and bags. While these aren’t technically charm earrings, they have the same effect.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Under $200

Jenny Bird Nouveaux Puff Earrings

Sometimes you want a statement that can still be worn everyday; these are just that, according to commerce lead Alexis Bennett Parker.

Jewel Tones

Roxanne Assoulin The Marvelous Drop Earrings

If you want to feel like a pretty princess, these Roxanne Assoulin earrings add color and glitz to any outfit.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Pearl Clusters

Sophie Billie Brahe Grand Bisou Pearl Earrings

You, too, can be the girl in the pearl earrings with this elegant pick from Madison Rexroat.

Amazon Gem

Sordo Oriente Earrings

Alexis Bennett Parker’s choice is these sculptural silver drop earrings, which you can buy from Amazon.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Little Miss Matched

Ulla Johnson Zayin Earring Brass

One of the coolest jewelry trends this year has definitely been asymmetry, which is exactly what this pair from Ulla Johnson offers.

Hoops on Hoops

Panconesi Silver Pierced Serpent Hoop Earrings

Madison Rexroat told the team about Panconesi, and now Meg Donohue is utterly obsessed with these hopped up hoops.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Big Hearted

Lele Sadoughi Pearl Heart Stud Earrings

Lele Sadoughi has no shortage of statement earrings to choose from. I like these oversized pearl hearts because they’re both casual and classy.

Ear Cuff

Charlotte Chesnais Daisy Ear Cuff

Ear cuffs are already a statement, but this large cage style is especially so.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Flower Chains

Anthropologie Flower Drop Earrings

These playful floral danglers will add whimsy to any outfit. Plus, the cheerful style is super lightweight, making them easy to wear.

Why Trust ELLE

Every product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. We only recommend products that we stand behind, and the merchandise featured on our site is always driven by editorial and product testing standards, not by affiliate deals or advertising relationships. Any content created in partnership with advertisers is marked as such.
